## untilStr variable

String only. Returns a matcher which consumes input until the given string could be matched. If successful, calls `callback` with string recorded so far (excluding the matched terminator string) and returns `Match.FULL` result. Else `Match.PARTIAL`<!-- -->.

 until

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
untilStr: <C, R>(str: string, callback?: LitCallback<string, C, R> | undefined) => Matcher<string, C, R>
```
